init.title: Sensor End Delays
init.description:
Specify the delay to wait after a sensor event ends before updating Home Assistant in seconds. This is useful to catch multiple quick trips in one window without the state toggling on and off.

Delays are configured by sensor type. All values are in seconds.

deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.title: The {integration_title} YAML configuration import failed
deprecated_yaml_import_issue_cannot_conn.description:
Configuring {integration_title} using YAML is being removed but there was a connection error importing your YAML configuration.

Ensure connection to {integration_title} works and restart Home Assistant to try again or remove the {integration_title} YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and continue to [set up the integration]({url}) manually.

customize_config_ignored_present.title: {integration_title} sensors need to be manually disabled
customize_config_ignored_present.description:
Ignoring {integration_title} sensors via the YAML `customize` property is no longer supported.

If you still wish to ignore these sensors, you can disable the entities using the Home Assistant entity settings.

This warning will be removed once the YAML configuration is removed, and Home Assistant is restarted.

customize_config_delay_present.title: {integration_title} delay configuration is no longer supported
customize_config_delay_present.description:
Configuring a delay for {integration_title} sensors is no longer supported. The delay settings will be ignored.

This warning will be removed once the YAML configuration is removed, and Home Assistant is restarted.
